---
title: "fuckassscatterplots"
output: html_document
---

```{r}
for (i in 16:25) {
  var_name <- names(data_merge)[i]
  plot(exp(data_merge[, i]), data_merge$hs_Gen_Tot.1,
       xlab = var_name,
       ylab = "hs_Gen_Tot.1",
       main = paste("Scatterplot of", var_name, "vs CBCL problem score"))
}
```
